sources.title: KATCHEM KATE (1912)
sources.description: KATCHEM KATE Biograph Company, 636 ft., rel. June 13, 1912 dir. Mack Sennett, auth. Dell Henderson, cam. Percy Higginson cast: Mabel Normand, Fred Mace, Jack Pickford, Vivian Prescott, Tony O'Sullivan filmed: 4/1912 Location: CA copyright: June 25, 1912

metadata.Plot: Kate was a laundry girl and grew very tired of the ironing-board. She aspired to greater things, and when she saw an advertisement in the newspaper of a school at which one might become a famous detective in a few short, inexpensive lessons, with a guarantee of being provided with mysteries and criminals enough to keep one busy, she jumped at it. Was she successful? Well, see the picture.
metadata.Actors: Mabel Normand, Fred Mace, Jack Pickford
